title: Pentagon Alters Musk Meeting After Leaked War Plan Briefing Reports
summary: The Pentagon modified a planned meeting with Elon Musk after reports emerged that he was set to receive a classified briefing on potential U.S. war plans against China. Trump administration officials denied Musk would receive sensitive information, and the meeting was ultimately scaled back to a discussion about innovation and production efficiencies.
description: A planned Pentagon briefing for Elon Musk on potential U.S. war plans against China was scaled back after media reports, highlighting complex dynamics between tech leaders, government, and national security.
